<script lang="ts">
	import { ContextMenu as ContextMenuPrimitive } from "bits-ui";

	interface Props extends ContextMenuPrimitive.RootProps {}

	let { ...rest }: Props = $props();
</script>

<ContextMenuPrimitive.Root {...rest}>
	{@render rest.children?.()}
</ContextMenuPrimitive.Root>

<script lang="ts">
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";
	import { ContextMenu as ContextMenuPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";

	interface Props extends ContextMenuPrimitive.TriggerProps {
		class?: string;
		children?: Snippet;
	}

	let { class: className, children, ...rest }: Props = $props();
</script>

<ContextMenuPrimitive.Trigger class={cn(className)} {...rest}>
	{#if children}
		{@render children()}
	{/if}
</ContextMenuPrimitive.Trigger>

<script lang="ts">
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";
	import { ContextMenu as ContextMenuPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";

	interface Props extends ContextMenuPrimitive.ContentProps {
		class?: string;
		children?: Snippet;
	}

	let { class: className, children, ...rest }: Props = $props();
</script>

<ContextMenuPrimitive.Portal>
	<ContextMenuPrimitive.Content
		class={cn(
			"z-50 min-w-[8rem] overflow-hidden rounded-xl glass-heavy p-1 shadow-glass-lg data-[state=open]:animate-slide-in data-[state=closed]:animate-slide-out",
			className
		)}
		{...rest}
	>
		{#if children}
			{@render children()}
		{/if}
	</ContextMenuPrimitive.Content>
</ContextMenuPrimitive.Portal>

<script lang="ts">
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";
	import { ContextMenu as ContextMenuPrimitive } from "bits-ui";
	import type { Snippet } from "svelte";

	interface Props extends ContextMenuPrimitive.ItemProps {
		class?: string;
		children?: Snippet;
	}

	let { class: className, children, ...rest }: Props = $props();
</script>

<ContextMenuPrimitive.Item
	class={cn(
		"relative flex cursor-pointer select-none items-center rounded-lg px-2 py-1.5 text-sm outline-none transition-colors hover:bg-glass-light focus:bg-glass-light data-[disabled]:pointer-events-none data-[disabled]:opacity-50",
		className
	)}
	{...rest}
>
	{#if children}
		{@render children()}
	{/if}
</ContextMenuPrimitive.Item>

<script lang="ts">
	import { cn } from "$lib/utils/cn";
	import { ContextMenu as ContextMenuPrimitive } from "bits-ui";

	interface Props extends ContextMenuPrimitive.SeparatorProps {
		class?: string;
	}

	let { class: className, ...rest }: Props = $props();
</script>

<ContextMenuPrimitive.Separator class={cn("-mx-1 my-1 h-px bg-glass-border", className)} {...rest} />
